description: Campfires are one of the most useful early-game tools you can make.
They provide heat to prevent you from freezing, they let you cook food, they restore your sanity, and you'll need one to make a furnace!
Make sure to light your campfire with a /b/Sparkling Flint/b/ to light it up, then give it fuel to keep the flame going.
/a/TIP: You should keep your campfire when you make a furnace. It's worth crafting a second campfire, especially since furnaces can't cook food anymore./a/
